description: Undercover Cop Gets His Man ? In a scene reminiscent of Cops Gone Bad (winner, GayVN Best Sex Scene), Raging Stallion exclusive pig bottom Michael Soldier gets into trouble again. But this time it's gonna hurt. Like your average street-trash hooker, Soldier wags his fanny on the street and gets picked up by Rod Rockhard, who is on the prowl and really needs some white boy ass. Soldier should have known what he was in for ? after all, guys like Rod appear on the cover of magazines like Black Inches. That's right ? Rod packs a mean punch between his legs, and the rest of the scene shows Michael Soldier trying to cope! Down his throat or up his ass, Michael takes it like a man in this giant cock carnival!
title: Take It Like A Man, Scene #02
